title: Child Protection Officer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 months. I interviewed at United Nations Mission in Sudan
Interview Descriptions: My profile was checked online, after that I received some emails and participated of a phone panel interview, 3 people, It was asked about my experience in protection issues and gender.
Interview Questions: Telling us about your experience with protection concerns? Experience about advocacy for children rights and prevention of recruitment? How do you incorporate gender in your responsabilities?

title: Environmental Officer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at United Nations Mission in Sudan
Interview Descriptions: I was interviewed by phone for 45 minutes by 4 panelists. One was the HR. Two national staffs and two international staffs.  The HR informed me after the interview that I will hear from them after 2 weeks.
Interview Questions:
Experience in managing hazardous waste. 
The remaining more on the technical and competency based questions.

title: Political Affairs Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at United Nations Mission in Sudan
Interview Descriptions: Panel interview of 5 people. It was competency based and had questions from the competency areas required. It was about 40 minutes to an hour long.  Each person asked a question and follow up when required.

title: Medical Doctor Interview
Application Type: I applied through a staffing agency. I interviewed at United Nations Mission in Sudan
Interview Descriptions: COMPETENCY BASED , where there were 5 members on board including chief medical officer chairing the interview , questions were divided in  COS , personel, about UN , skills, competencies , and experience , last was some thing about social life

title: O I/C AMET Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at United Nations Mission in Sudan
Interview Descriptions: Hiring on requirement and shortlisting based on professional background.
